text.section: To qualify for a permit, a corporation, limited liability company, or partnership shall meet the requirements of this section.

section.section: At least two-thirds of the directors of a corporation shall be licensed in this or another state to practice architecture, engineering, or landscape architecture.
At least two-thirds of the partners of a partnership shall be licensed in this or another state to practice architecture, engineering, or landscape architecture.

If the partnership is a limited partnership, at least two-thirds of the general partners of the limited partnership shall be licensed in this or another state to practice architecture, engineering, or landscape architecture.
At least two-thirds of the members of a limited liability company shall be licensed in this or another state to practice architecture, engineering, or landscape architecture.
A corporation, limited liability company, or partnership shall have appointed at least 1 responsible member of the corporation, limited liability company, or partnership.
A responsible member shall be in charge of architecture practiced through the corporation, limited liability company, or partnership.

Each responsible member shall be:
a director of a corporation, a member of a limited liability company, or a partner of a partnership; and
a licensed architect.
